main_definition: Broadband refers to high-speed internet access that is always on and faster than the traditional dial-up access.

meanings_and_examples.example: The broadband service I have allows me to download files quickly compared to my old dial-up connection.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Wide range of frequencies in a signal or transmission medium
meanings_and_examples.example: Broadband signals can carry more information than narrowband, which makes it ideal for transmitting high-quality audio and video streams.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A wide variety of types or categories
meanings_and_examples.example: The broadband catalogue at the store offers an extensive range of products from electronics to clothing.
